project.label: Modbus Import Example
project.description:
It polls a serial device for 1 data value, which is converted to a Dia data channel. It issues a single fixed request, and expects a single dynamic response. In this sample, the serial protocol used is Modbus/RTU, however the user should be able to easily implement a new protocol of their choosing.

It assumes:

  • you attach a Modbus/RTU serial slave to the serial port of the Digi product.
  • that the Modbus/RTU slave address is 1.
  • that the Modbus/RTU device supports holding register 4x00001.
  • RS-232 or RS-485 must be set correctly in the Digi product
  • the serial profile of the Digi product should be set to TCP Sockets

    • This example configures the channel 2 and 3 of the device (first and second digital channels) to be outputs alternating a high and low value on them each second.

platforms.platform: ConnectPort X5 F ZB Wifi GPRS
ConnectPort X5 R ZB Wifi GPRS
ConnectPort X5 R ZB Wifi CDMA
ConnectPort X5 R Wifi GPRS Iridium
